title: no goddamn chest boxes
body: plzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzz its been more then 2 monthes since i got my last box and i already have 5 keys fragment

replies.body:
The most frequent reason for not seeing many chests is playing a small pool of champs that you're earning S-ratings on. I recommend widening the pool of champs you're kicking butt with since you can only earn 1 chest on each champion per season. A complete rundown of the Hextech Crafting system and earning chests can be found [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide).

Let me know if you have any questions.

Greetings!

Have you recieved a punishment recently? If so, that's probably the reason.
